title: Jewel: A Sweet Romance
description: Yasmin Colburn is a psych geek whose love for her family brings her back home to Mekar one semester early.She has trouble fitting in, as she is very much a traditional Asian stuck in the body of a gorgeous Eurasian girl's.Danial Azhar is 3rd in line to the Mekar throne. At turns serious, plagued by his responsibilities as prince, and at times playful, he is stunned by the new girl in the front row of his Psych class, whose intelligence draws him in.Theirs is a love story of longing, differences that could set them apart - and hope that knows no bounds.
author: Aisha Malik
